description: Demolition of existing buildings and construction of mixed use building of around 58,800sq m on basement, lower ground and 18 upper floors (giving a total height of 88 meters from Joiner Street level) to provide around 41,000sq m net offices (B1), 1,400 sq m net retail and food and drink uses (A1, A3, A4 and A5), with new bus station, taxi rank and pedestrian concourse and entrance to London Bridge Underground Station at Joiner Street.
decision_conditions: This Council considers the proposal to be a considerable improvement to that currently occupying the site and will probably marginally improve the Strategic Views of St Pauls. However it will be overwhelmed by the ‘Shard’. Therefore the Council has no observation to make.
